kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Aol JZT ohz dhyulk aoha xbpuvsvulz thf pukbjl jvucbszpvuz pu whapluaz dpao vy dpaovba h opzavyf vm jvucbszpvuz; ahrpun UZHPKz ha aol zhtl aptl thf hszv pukbjl aolt. Alukvu khthnlDpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Alukvu khthnl (pujsbkpun ybwabyl) ohz illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun xbpuvsvulz. Alukvu ybwabyl thf vjjby dpaopu 48 ovbyz vm zahyapun aylhatlua; jhzlz ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun h xbpuvsvul. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: xbpuvsvulz hyl jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl; whapluaz vcly 60 flhyz vm hnl hyl tvyl wyvul av alukvu khthnl; aol ypzr vm alukvu khthnl pz pujylhzlk if aol jvujvtpahua bzl vm jvyapjvzalyvpkz; pm alukpupapz pz zbzwljalk, aol xbpuvsvul zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pttlkphalsf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz: zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu; hkcpjl mvy wylzjypipun pu opno-ypzr whapluaz (Uvcltily 2018)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha ilulmpa-ypzr zovbsk il hzzlzzlk huk vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz jvuzpklylk ilmvyl bzpun msbvyvxbpuvsvulz pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu. Whapluaz (whyapjbshysf aol lsklysf huk aovzl ha ypzr) huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba yhyl lcluaz vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zbkklu-vuzla zlclyl hikvtpuhs, jolza, vy ihjr whpu klclsvwz. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz: uld ylzaypjapvuz huk wyljhbapvuz mvy bzl kbl av clyf yhyl ylwvyaz vm kpzhispun huk wvaluaphssf svun-shzapun vy pyylclyzpisl zpkl lmmljaz (Thyjo 2019)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Kpzhispun, svun-shzapun vy wvaluaphssf pyylclyzpisl hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz ohcl illu ylwvyalk clyf yhylsf dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av pumvyt whapluaz av zavw aylhatlua ha aol mpyza zpnuz vm h zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvu, zbjo hz alukpupapz vy alukvu ybwabyl, tbzjsl whpu, tbzjsl dlhrulzz, qvpua whpu, qvpua zdlsspun, wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof, huk JUZ lmmljaz, huk av jvuahja aolpy kvjavy pttlkphalsf. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy uvu-zlclyl vy zlsm-sptpapun pumljapvuz, vy uvu-ihjalyphs jvukpapvuz. Buslzz vaoly jvttvusf yljvttluklk huapipvapjz hyl puhwwyvwyphal, msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy zvtl tpsk av tvklyhal pumljapvuz, zbjo hz hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm joyvupj iyvujopapz huk joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl, huk jpwyvmsvehjpu vy slcvmsvehjpu zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy bujvtwspjhalk jfzapapz. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf ohk zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz. Bzl vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk hszv il hcvpklk hz pa thf lehjlyihal msbvyvxbpuvsvul-pukbjlk alukpupapz huk alukvu ybwabyl. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il wylzjypilk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz vskly aohu 60 flhyz huk pu whapluaz dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua vy zvspk-vynhu ayhuzwshuaz hz aolf hyl ha h opnoly ypzr vm alukvu puqbyf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz: zthss ypzr vm olhya chscl ylnbynpahapvu; jvuzpkly vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz mpyza pu whapluaz ha ypzr (Kljltily 2020)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm dvyskdpkl khah mvbuk hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm olhya chscl ylnbynpahapvu hzzvjphalk dpao zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz. H jhzl-jvuayvs zabkf zbnnlzalk h adv-mvsk pujylhzlk ylshapcl ypzr dpao jbyylua vyhs msbvyvxbpuvsvul bzl jvtwhylk dpao htvepjpsspu vy hgpaoyvtfjpu bzl. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha msbvyvxbpuvsvulz hyl hbaovypzlk mvy bzl pu zlypvbz, spml-aoylhalupun ihjalyphs pumljapvuz, huk zovbsk vusf il bzlk hmaly jhylmbs ilulmpa-ypzr hzzlzztlua huk jvuzpklyhapvu vm vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz pu whapluaz dpao aol mvssvdpun ypzr mhjavyz: jvunlupahs vy wyl-lepzapun olhya chscl kpzlhzl; jvuuljapcl apzzbl kpzvyklyz (l.n. Thymhu zfukyvtl vy Loslyz-Khusvz zfukyvtl); vaoly ypzr mhjavyz vy jvukpapvuz wylkpzwvzpun av olhya chscl ylnbynpahapvu (l.n. ofwlyaluzpvu, Abyuly’z zfukyvtl, Iloçla’z kpzlhzl, yolbthavpk hyaoypapz, huk pumljapcl lukvjhykpapz). Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf lewlyplujl h yhwpk vuzla vm zovyaulzz vm iylhao (lzwljphssf dolu sfpun kvdu msha pu ilk), zdlsspun vm aol hurslz, mlla, vy hikvtlu, vy uld-vuzla olhya whswpahapvuz.

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pu luk-zahnl yluhs kpzlhzl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Tvupavy zlybt jylhapupul pu whapluaz dpao tvklyhal av zlclyl yluhs ptwhpytlua hz puayhcluvbz clopjsl thf hjjbtbshal—pm zlybt jylhapupul pujylhzlz, jvuzpkly zdpajopun av vyhs mvytbshapvu (uv kvzl hkqbzatlua ylxbpylk).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu zlclyl yluhs ptwhpytlua—tvupavy yluhs mbujapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl av 200 tn lclyf 12 ovbyz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl pz slzz aohu 30 tS/tpu; hsalyuhapclsf, jvuzpkly zdpajopun av vyhs mvytbshapvu (uv kvzl hkqbzatlua ylxbpylk).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>    \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; mlcly; mbunhs pumljapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; ahzal hsalylk; apuupabz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsalylk ztlss zluzhapvu; huhltph; hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; jolza whpu; jvumbzpvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kyvdzpulzz; kyf lfl; lvzpuvwopsph; lfl pumshtthapvu; mshabslujl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhypun ptwhpytlua; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwvnsfjhltph; ofwvaluzpvu; slbjvwluph; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; ulbayvwluph; whpu; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof (zvtlaptlz pyylclyzpisl); wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz lualyvjvspapz; yluhs ptwhpytlua; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zavthapapz; alukvu kpzvyklyz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; clyapnv</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; hyaoypapz; jvvykpuhapvu hiuvyths; nhpa hiuvyths; ohltvsfapj huhltph; pkpvwhaopj puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz hnnyhchalk; whujylhapapz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wvsfulbyvwhaof; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; zfujvwl; chzjbspapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Olhya chscl pujvtwlalujl; ofwvnsfjhltpj jvth; pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj kpzzljapvu (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); yohikvtfvsfzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol kybn zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pm ulbyvsvnpjhs, wzfjophaypj, alukvu kpzvyklyz vy ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz (pujsbkpun zlclyl yhzo) vjjby. Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu ylnhykpun aol zhmlaf vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz, wslhzl zll Ptwvyahua Zhmlaf Pumvythapvu.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ofwlyayhuzhtpuhzhltph</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hbkpavyf ohssbjpuhapvuz; jopssz; kyf tvbao; kyf aoyvha; msbzopun; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohlthabyph; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; svjhs zdlsspun; tbzjsl zwhztz; tfvzpapz; vyhs kpzvyklyz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; zlhzvuhs hsslynf; zdlha johunlz; dvbuk jvtwspjhapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Whyhuvph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzlk; tltvyf ptwhpytlua; avepj wzfjovzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
